VLC is awful. Media Player Classic - Home Cinema, is the best player out there. It comes bundled inside  the CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack) download which is the most efficient codec pack of all. Install CCCP and never have a problem with playback again. 

http://www.cccp-project.net
http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/
